summary: Samuel Dequina Bernal, M.D., Ph. D., is the Principal Investigator/Program Director at Johns Hopkins Hospital Baltimore. He is also an Assistant Professor of Medicine at Harvard Medical School and a Clinical Fellow in Medical Oncology at the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute.
